name: Upwards
description:
Made this for Ludum Dare 42. 

A simple fast paced action game. 

Reach as far up as you can while dodging bullets, spikes and enemies.

Post-Jam Version : https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/715769

Red enemies simply move left and right. Yellow one change direction your way when close.

Changes in the interface and music(only in the web version).Added 5 simple loopy tracks to suit your need and a volume control. Cheers.

You can also download the executable file for windows.
